Text: "My Little Town" is a 1975 song by the American duo Simon & Garfunkel.

<Text: My Little Town:  It was written by Paul Simon, who produced the track along with Art Garfunkel and Phil Ramone.>

Text: My Little Town:  Although the song would not appear on any of the duo's albums until later, it was included on both the solo releases for Simon ("Still Crazy After All These Years") and Garfunkel ("Breakaway") in 1975.
